person.persName: Isaac Rice (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer & hosp steward 39th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Celia Conley Rice. Father of Alexander Rice, Samuel M. Rice, Andrew W. Rice, James M. Rice, Thomas I. Rice, John H. Rice, Charles Rice, and Susan I. Rice. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Served in the 39 Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and hospital steward from February 16, 1863, to September 15, 1865.
